p: In acute toxicity tests, a total of 18 Wistar female rats was randomly allocated into 6 groups consisting of 3 rats per group. That is, Group I (Control), Group II ( R. abyssinicus), Group III ( S. punctata), Group IV ( C. murale), Group V ( A. pulcherrima) and Group VI( A. aspera). Each group of rats was administered with a single fixed dose of the respective TM extracts tested in a stepwise procedure (125, 500, and 2000 mg/kg body weight). Group I rats received distilled water (vehicle) until the end of the experiment.
